verses.verse: What <WG5101> shall we say <WG2046> then <WG3767>? Shall we continue <WG1961> in sin <WG266>, that <WG2443> grace <WG5485> may abound <WG4121>?
God forbid <WG1096>. We <WG2198> who <WG3748> died <WG599> to sin <WG266>, how <WG4459> shall we any longer <WG2089> live <WG2198> therein <WG846>?
Or are ye ignorant <WG50> that <WG3754> all we who <WG3754> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> his <WG846> death <WG2288>?

We were buried <WG4916> therefore <WG3767> with him <WG846> through <WG1223> baptism <WG908> into <WG1519> death <WG2288>: that <WG2443> like as <WG5618> Christ <WG5547> was raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> through <WG1223> the glory <WG1391> of the Father <WG3962>, so <WG3779> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> might walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> newness <WG2538> of life <WG2222>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> we have become <WG1096> united with <WG4854> him in the likeness <WG3667> of his <WG846> death <WG2288>, we shall <WG2071> be <WG235> also <WG2532> in the likeness of his resurrection <WG386>;

knowing <WG1097> this <WG5124>, that <WG3754> our <WG2257> old <WG3820> man <WG444> was crucified with <WG4957> him <WG2443>, that the body <WG4983> of sin <WG266> might be done away <WG2673>, that <WG3588> so we <WG2248> should <WG1398> no <WG3371> longer be <WG1398> in bondage <WG1398> to sin <WG266>;
for <WG1063> he that hath died <WG599> is justified <WG1344> from <WG575> sin <WG266>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> we died <WG599> with <WG4862> Christ <WG5547>, we believe <WG4100> that <WG3754> we shall <WG4800> also <WG2532> live with <WG4800> him <WG846>;

knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> Christ <WG5547> being raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> dieth <WG599> no more <WG3765>; death <WG2288> no more <WG3765> hath <WG2961> dominion <WG2961> over him <WG846>.
For <WG1063> the death that <WG3739> he died <WG599>, he died <WG599> unto sin <WG266> once <WG2178>: but <WG1161> the life that <WG3739> he liveth <WG2198>, he liveth <WG2198> unto God <WG2316>.

Even <WG3779> so reckon <WG3049> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> yourselves <WG1438> to be <WG1511> dead3498, Ezekiel3 unto sin <WG266>, but <WG1161> alive <WG2198> unto God <WG2316> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Let <WG936> not <WG3361> sin <WG266> therefore <WG3767> reign <WG936> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> mortal <WG2349> body <WG4983>, that ye should <WG1519> obey <WG5219> the lusts <WG1939> thereof <WG846>:

neither <WG3366> present <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> unto sin <WG266> as <WG5613> instruments <WG3696> of unrighteousness <WG93>; but <WG235> present <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> unto God <WG2316>, as alive <WG2198> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as instruments <WG3696> of righteousness <WG1343> unto God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> sin <WG266> shall <WG2961> not <WG3756> have dominion over <WG2961> you <WG5216>: for <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> law <WG3551>, but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace <WG5485>.
What <WG5101> then <WG3767>? shall we sin <WG264>, because <WG3754> we are <WG2070> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> law <WG3551>, but <WG235> under <WG5259> grace <WG5485>? God <WG3361> forbid <WG1096>.

Know ye <WG1492> not <WG3756>, that <WG3754> to whom <WG3739> ye present <WG3936> yourselves <WG1438> as servants <WG1401> unto <WG1519> obedience <WG5218>, his servants <WG1401> ye are <WG2075> whom <WG3739> ye obey <WG5219>; whether <WG2273> of sin <WG266> unto <WG1519> death <WG2288>, or <WG2228> of obedience <WG5218> unto <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>?

But <WG1161> thanks <WG5485> be to God <WG2316>, that <WG3754>, whereas ye were <WG2258> servants <WG1401> of sin <WG266>, <WG1161> ye became obedient <WG5219> from <WG1537> the heart <WG2588> to <WG1519> that form <WG5179> of teaching <WG1322> whereunto <WG3739> ye were delivered <WG3860>;
and <WG1161> being <WG1659> made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin <WG266>, ye became servants <WG1402> of righteousness <WG1343>.

I speak <WG3004> after the manner of men <WG442> because of <WG1223> the infirmity <WG769> of your <WG5216> flesh <WG4561>: for <WG1063> as <WG5618> ye presented <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as servants <WG1401> to uncleanness <WG167> and <WG2532> to iniquity <WG458> unto <WG1519> iniquity <WG458>, even so <WG3779> now <WG3568> present <WG3936> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> as servants <WG1401> to righteousness <WG1343> unto <WG1519> sanctification <WG38>.
For <WG1063> when <WG3753> ye were <WG2258> servants <WG1401> of sin <WG266>, ye were <WG2258> free <WG1658> in regard of righteousness <WG1343>.

What <WG5101> fruit <WG2590> then <WG5119> had ye <WG2192> at that time in <WG1909> the things whereof <WG3739> ye are <WG1870> now <WG3568> ashamed <WG1870>? for <WG1063> the end <WG5056> of those things <WG1565> is death <WG2288>.

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> being made free <WG1659> from <WG575> sin <WG266> and <WG1161> become servants <WG1402> to God <WG2316>, ye have <WG2192> your <WG5216> fruit <WG2590> unto <WG1519> sanctification <WG38>, and <WG1161> the end <WG5056> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.

For <WG1063> the wages <WG3800> of sin <WG266> is death <WG2288>; but <WG1161> the free gift <WG5486> of God <WG2316> is eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>.
